title: Checking Number Within Specified Range
description: In this lab, we will explore the concept of checking whether a given number falls within a specified range. We will use arithmetic comparison to check if the number is in the range and handle cases where the end of the range is not specified. By the end of the lab, you will have a better understanding of how to check if a number is within a given range in JavaScript.

meta.title: Checking Number Within Specified Range
meta.description: Explore the concept of checking if a number falls within a specified range using JavaScript.
meta.keywords: arithmetic comparison, javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, programming tutorial, javascript lab, javascript tutor, number range

verify.name: Verify Node Commands In Zsh History
verify.hint: JavaScript can be run in the Terminal/SSH by typing 'node' and pressing Enter.
